desc: I committed on the day Doctor Emmett Brown invented the flux capacitor!
I rolled before Covid-19: Survivor of the Great TP Shortage
I have participated in pull requests with 5 or more people
body: Pull requests: - #5389: Possibility to extend the TemplateFinder

desc: I have participated in pull requests with 10 or more people
I have participated in pull requests with 15 or more people
I closed an issue that was open for a year
body: Issues: - #180: Add double dots in url. - #7: Try to type assetic. - #343: Dependency Injection - #344: Event Dispatcher - #354: Lock and unlock releases - #345: Default stage selector - #347: Immutable settings - #349: Task grouping for parallel execution - #348: Native SSH support - #44: Integrate checks from publish-please - #11: Got error: dlopen(priv/yomel.so, 2): image not found - #20: No parallel execution? - #371: Empty loops - #1: Add Russian language support - #180: DOM template engine with "updaters". - #133: nodeValue in toString - #1411: How to write transform with support for source maps? - #33: Fail toComment with included content. - #16: Add Monkberry - #1258: How to override fosub_bridge service? - #69: Add deployer - #1487: Add ['override' => true] option in task - #1441: New stage() func proposal - #16: Display long array one item per line - #2544: Badge request: Snapcraft - #208: What about merging recipes and deployer? - #1610: Add support for + in --roles option - #5: What about vendoring symfony into deployer? - #1797: Deployer release policy - #1772: [Proposal] Copy-Paste recipes during init stage - #2356: Migrate to expr - #102: Long line with line number become invisible - #196: Config option to overflow long numbers - #569: Set verbose=false as default - #550: Separate $ into zx-core - #3671: Allow to continue parallel deployment if one host failed - #3656: YAML: allow to give description to groups tasks - #3655: Import in yaml should be relative to base recipe - #3648: It looks like this has to do with the on() function: - #3644: die() should kill the master - #3605: Autoloading of third party recipes not working - #3594: Importer: error if `php_fpm_version` is integer - #3558: Docs: add an example with bastion server - #3419: Add a check for non-serilizable configs

desc: I closed an issue that was open for 2 years
body: Issues: - #74: No documentation! - #1336: Increase code coverage up to 80% - #1238: Deployer Vault - #1302: Implement atomic symlink for BSD systems - #1346: Dynamic Inventory - #1384: Deprecate stage in favour of roles - #1385: Check for opcache.enable_cli and apc.enable_cli - #1397: Rsync and recursive directories creation - #1399: Combine drupal7 and drupal8 recipes - #1401: Combine symfony and symfony3 recipes - #1459: Proposal: parameter description. - #1460: Proposal: parameter validator - #1498: Notify about tailing slash on shared_dirs - #1549: default_stage/default_roles - #1566: Add var/sessions to shared for symfony 4 recipe. - #1414: Create a new bin/pull-request script - #1438: New proposal for recipes loading - #1514: Rename runLocally to run_locally? - #1516: [Proposal] Rely on bash instead of POSIX shell in common recipe - #1494: Separate deploy task from framework recipe - #369: Better input for blessed - #20: Bug with fullUnicode: true - #173: Add orgs stats for owners - #52: jsize ky - #37: Using bash autocomplete _filedir - #119: Argument auto-splitting - #3220: Add JIGSAW recipe - #3219: Add grav recipe - #3198: Implement default_selector - #3073: Warn about obsolete git_tty - #2969: Detect Motd and warn users about it - #2882: Do not automatically populate known_hosts - #2704: Add an integration test for the provision recipe

desc: I closed an issue that was open for 3 years
body: Issues: - #87: Display in UI full path - #19: Ignore vendor directory - #19: Add Doctrine profile. - #125: Deprecate local recipe - #1140: Conditional tasks - #1130: dep status command for health-check - #976: Identify user mistakes in config - #51: Bug if you skip one version in sequence - #991: Configuration to turn off showing alias references - #897: How to auto-format without extra indent? - #62: See more on first render - #13: Add support for tags `expr:"..."` - #2231: Code coverage Github Action

desc: I closed an issue that was open for 4 years
body: Issues: - #61: Cant install theme without chmod 777 - #24: onClick event on list items on iPhone. - #101: Conflict with bootstrap class .close. - #4: Add Russian language! - #5: Code Blocks on 13'' sсreen - #350: Web-based client - #26: Optimize conditional jumps

desc: I merged a PR with failing checks
I found the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe, and everything!

body:
My favorite commit message words are:

1. update (used 741 times)
2. add (used 697 times)
3. readme.md (used 362 times)
4. fix (used 284 times)
5. to (used 261 times)

I use words like "thanks" and "please" in my issues: - #1168: Cheatsheet request: fx - #75: With termenv.Ascii color profile, lipgloss prints `\e[1;m` - #81: New API: fast colors - #771: Consider adding fx - #242: Show cursor in AltScreen And many more...
